transport_page_subtitle: Get a ride anywhere on campus
transport_page_desc: Safe, affordable rides with verified student drivers. Book a ride in seconds and track your driver in real-time.
transport_hero_desc: Connect with verified student drivers for safe, affordable transportation anywhere on campus.
transport_feature_1_desc: All drivers are verified students with valid licenses and vehicle documents.
transport_feature_2_desc: Track your driver's location in real-time and know exactly when they'll arrive.
transport_feature_3_desc: Choose your preferred driver gender for a more comfortable ride experience.
transport_feature_4_desc: Know the exact fare before you book. No surge pricing, just fair rates.
transport_step_1: Set your pickup and destination on the map
transport_step_2: Choose your preferences and confirm the fare
transport_step_3: Get matched with a nearby driver instantly
transport_step_4: Track your ride and arrive safely
goods_page_desc: Fast, secure delivery for documents, packages, laundry, and more. Same-day delivery with proof of receipt.
goods_hero_desc: Quick and reliable delivery service for all your campus needs. From documents to laundry, we've got you covered.
goods_feature_1_desc: Most deliveries arrive within hours. Perfect for urgent documents or last-minute needs.
goods_feature_2_desc: Photo verification and OTP confirmation ensure your items arrive safely.
goods_feature_3_desc: Send small documents or larger packages up to 20kg. We handle it all.
goods_feature_4_desc: Get notified at every step: picked up, in transit, and delivered.
food_page_desc: Browse menus from your favorite campus eateries. Fresh food delivered right to your location.
food_hero_desc: Order from canteens, cafes, and food stalls across campus. Hot food delivered fresh to you.
food_feature_1_desc: Support local merchants and enjoy your favorite campus meals.
food_feature_2_desc: See when your order is being prepared, picked up, and on the way.
food_feature_3_desc: Pay with your wallet, QRIS, or bank transfer. No cash needed.
food_feature_4_desc: Add notes for custom orders or dietary preferences.
driver_page_desc: Join hundreds of student drivers earning extra income between classes. Flexible hours, transparent earnings.
driver_hero_desc: Make money between classes with flexible hours. Be your own boss while helping your fellow students.
driver_benefit_1_desc: Work around your classes. Auto-offline during lectures so you never miss important sessions.
driver_benefit_2_desc: Withdraw your earnings to your bank account anytime. Track your income in real-time.
driver_benefit_3_desc: Keep 85% of ride fares. Tips are 100% yours. No hidden fees.
driver_benefit_4_desc: Serve fellow students in a safe, familiar environment. Build your reputation.
driver_earnings_desc: Average drivers earn between Rp 50,000 - Rp 150,000 per day working 2-3 hours between classes.

faq_general_a1: AkadeMove is a campus-specific mobility and delivery platform connecting students as users, drivers, and merchants. We offer ride-hailing, package delivery, and food ordering services exclusively within campus boundaries.
faq_general_a2: AkadeMove is available to all students, faculty, and staff with a valid campus ID. Drivers must be students with valid licenses and vehicle documentation.
faq_general_a3: We offer three main services: Ride-hailing for campus transportation, Delivery for packages and documents, and Food delivery from campus merchants.
faq_orders_q1: How do I place an order?
faq_orders_a1: Open the app, select your service type (Ride, Delivery, or Food), set your pickup and destination points, review the fare, and confirm your booking.
faq_orders_a2: Yes, you can cancel before a driver accepts your order with no penalty. After acceptance, a 10% cancellation fee applies. If the driver arrives and you're not present, a 50% no-show fee is charged.
faq_orders_a3: Matching typically takes less than 30 seconds. If no driver accepts within this time, we'll automatically expand the search radius.
faq_payment_a1: You can pay using your in-app wallet, which can be topped up via QRIS or bank transfer through Midtrans.
faq_payment_q2: How do I top up my wallet?
Go to your wallet, select 'Top Up', choose your amount and payment method (QRIS or bank transfer), complete the payment through Midtrans.
faq_payment_a3: For rides and deliveries, the platform takes a 15% commission. For food orders, there's a 20% commission split between the platform (10%) and merchant (10%). Tips go 100% to drivers.
faq_driver_q1: How do I become a driver?
faq_driver_a1: Click 'Become a Driver', submit your student ID (KTM), driver's license (SIM), and vehicle registration (STNK). Once verified and approved, you can start accepting orders.
faq_driver_q2: Can I work during my class schedule?
faq_driver_a2: The app automatically sets you offline during your scheduled class times. You can manually override this if needed, but we recommend focusing on your studies.
faq_driver_q3: When can I withdraw my earnings?
faq_driver_a3: You can withdraw your earnings to your bank account anytime after completing orders. Withdrawals are typically processed within 24 hours.
faq_safety_a1: Users can optionally request a driver of the same gender for added comfort and safety. This is especially useful for late-night rides.
faq_safety_q2: What if I feel unsafe during a ride?
faq_safety_a2: Use the in-app emergency button to alert campus security immediately. You can also report the driver after the trip, and our team will investigate promptly.
faq_safety_a3: All drivers must submit and get approved for their student ID, driver's license, and vehicle registration. We verify all documents before activation.
about_page_subtitle: A campus mobility solution built by students, for students, creating a safe, affordable, and empowering ecosystem.
about_story_p1: AkadeMove was born from real student experiences facing daily mobility challenges on campus. Long distances between faculties, lengthy wait times for ride-hailing services, and safety concerns became everyday problems.
about_story_p2: We believe students can be the solution for fellow students. By leveraging technology and the strong campus community, AkadeMove emerges as a platform that not only facilitates mobility but also empowers students with flexible earning opportunities.
about_story_p3: Starting from one campus in Surabaya, AkadeMove now serves thousands of trips every week, connecting students with student drivers and supporting hundreds of local merchants around campus.
about_mission_text: Facilitate student mobility and activities on campus with services that are safe, affordable, and empower the campus community.
about_vision_text: To become Indonesia's leading campus mobility platform that empowers students as business partners and creates a more productive campus ecosystem.
about_value_trust_desc: Strict driver verification, gender preferences, and a safe campus-only ecosystem for all users.
about_value_empowerment_desc: Flexible earning opportunities that respect academic schedules and study priorities.
about_value_community_desc: Built by students, for students, supporting campus merchants and the local economy.
about_value_transparency_desc: Clear pricing, fair commission structure, no hidden fees for all parties.
about_value_innovation_desc: Class schedule integration, real-time tracking, gamification, and cutting-edge features.
about_benefits_students_2: Order food from favorite campus vendors
about_benefits_students_4: Choose drivers based on gender preference
about_benefits_drivers_5: Easy fund withdrawal to bank account
about_team_subtitle: Meet the people behind AkadeMove dedicated to making campus mobility better.
about_team_member_1_bio: Computer Science student who started AkadeMove from personal experiences with campus mobility challenges.
about_team_member_2_bio: Technology expert with a passion for building solutions that empower the student community.
about_team_member_3_bio: Experienced in campus logistics, ensuring services run smoothly every day.
about_team_member_4_bio: Building relationships with drivers, merchants, and users for a healthy ecosystem.
about_partnerships_subtitle: Collaborating with leading universities to create a more productive campus ecosystem.
about_partnership_1_desc: The first campus to adopt AkadeMove for student mobility.
about_partnership_2_desc: Collaboration on technology innovation and platform development.
about_partnership_3_desc: Pilot program for automatic class schedule integration.
about_social_subtitle: Our commitment to creating positive impacts for the environment, society, and campus economy.
about_social_carbon_desc: By optimizing routes and sharing trips, we reduce the campus carbon footprint.
about_social_welfare_desc: Safe transportation with verified student drivers and gender preferences.
about_social_economy_desc: Supporting local merchants and providing earning opportunities for students.
about_cta_subtitle: Let's work together to create a better campus ecosystem. Sign up now and feel the difference.
landing_hero_subtitle: From students for students: transportation, food ordering, and package delivery made easier, safer, and more comfortable.
landing_trouble_2: Hard to find safe drivers around campus.
landing_trouble_3: Food orders take forever at the cafeteria.
landing_solution_1: Verified student drivers, Choose by gender
landing_solution_2: Order food & goods directly via app
landing_solution_4: Class schedule integration for more flexible drivers.
landing_feature_1_desc: Flexible pickup and drop-off, student drivers, transparent per-km rates.
landing_feature_2_desc: Order food, laundry, documents, or packages with a single click.
landing_feature_3_desc: Gender filter, emergency button, chat without phone numbers.
landing_testimonial_1_quote: Safer because the driver is also a student. I can choose a female driver.
landing_testimonial_2_quote: Great for extra pocket money, class schedule can still be managed.
landing_testimonial_3_quote: My stall is busier, because students can order online through the app.
landing_cta_title: Ready for a Better Campus Experience?
landing_cta_subtitle: Join thousands of students who have experienced the convenience of campus mobility and delivery.
